trans-unit.source: Delegate used by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class for deserialization of types from SOAP-encoded, non-root XML data.
trans-unit.target: Representanten brukes av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>klasse deserialisering av typer i SOAP-kodet, ikke rot-XML-data.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> class.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering av .NET Framework XML-serialisering dynamisk genererer og kompilerer en midlertidig klasse deserialisering avledet fra <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates read methods that implement the XmlSerializationReadCallback delegate.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework genererer skrivebeskyttede metoder som implementerer XmlSerializationReadCallback representanten under denne prosessen.

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes s√• for en bestemt samsvar mellom datatyper i .NET Framework og XML-datatyper som er serialisert via SOAP-kodet XML ikke og rotelementer.

trans-unit.source: Then, as necessary, a read method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Les metoden kalles deretter etter behov under deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Do not directly create instances of the XmlSerializationReadCallback class.
trans-unit.target: Ikke opprette forekomster av klassen XmlSerializationReadCallback direkte.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-koding er beskrevet i delen 5 av SOAP 1.1-spesifikasjonen.
